message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  It's best to settle this now before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
Your turn Alice. I'm proposing a 55/45 split in my favor.  Let's settle this now, it's a fair offer considering the inflation.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere fast. I'm willing to compromise. Let's do a 52/48 split in my favor. We both lose more if this drags on.
